alert.note: Alert for Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 25 at 3:07AM MDT until March 27 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 7 and 15 inches, greatest near the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...In Montana, Bighorn Canyon and Southern Big Horn. In Wyoming, Sheridan Foothills. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. The cold and wet conditions could be hazardous for young livestock. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow will occur through this morning. Expect higher-end accumulations mainly on grassy surfaces. Snow is expected to lighten up this evening, then pick back up on Sunday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
